Adverlets
Thursday, March 8, 2012
Yummy Sarawak Laksa@Chong Lin Park, Kuching Friend of ours told and confirmed that the laksa stall in Chong Lin Park is one of the best in Kuching. So far, we have tried a few good ones ( namely Choon Hui, Foody Goody etc), and really, today our exploration to this hidden gem and humble stall confirms that he is right.
This hidden gem is a stall located inside Mei Mei Food Court in Chong Lin Park ( Jalan Tabuan ), open only for breakfast. My bowl of yummy laksa with perfect soup and general toppings~~~~simply sedap!
